Address: 3102 SHAWNEE DRIVE, WINCHESTER, Virginia, 22601, United States of America
CompanyDescription: American Woodmark Corporation ("American Woodmark," the "Company," "we," "our" or "us") was incorporated in 1980 by the four principal managers of the Boise Cascade Cabinet Division through a leveraged buyout of that division. We operated privately until 1986 when we became a public company through a registered public offering of common stock. We manufacture and distribute kitchen, bath and home organization products for the remodeling and new home construction markets. Our products are sold on a national basis directly to home centers and builders and through a network of independent dealers and distributors. We presently operate 18 manufacturing facilities and eight primary service centers across the country and Mexico.  ... More ...
